unnormalised: Arre yaar, SBI bank statement shows ₹250 debited as "txn charges"?! Like, what? I just transferred ₹5000 to my bhai's account using UPI. Shouldn't that be free? Plus, they're charging ₹20 for SMS alerts! Seriously considering switching to HDFC, heard they have better online banking and fewer hidden costs. My friend Priya told me she gets unlimited IMPS transfers for free, even for amounts like ₹10,000. What a scam this is!
normalised: Arre yaar, S-B-I bank statement shows rupee two hundred and fifty debited as "transaction charges"?! Like, what? I just transferred rupee five thousand to my bhai's account using U-P-I. Shouldn't that be free? Plus, they're charging rupee twenty for S-M-S alerts! Seriously considering switching to H-D-F-C, heard they have better online banking and fewer hidden costs. My friend Priya told me she gets unlimited I-M-P-S transfers for free, even for amounts like rupee ten thousand. What a scam this is!
